attributes.action: Send a delegation of police officers to assist in the investigation into the disappearance of Madeleine Mccann
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Investigation in Portugal is struggling.  British Police have expertise in this area that could be shared.  Madeleine is a British citizen and if anyone needs help she does.  This action needs to take place immediately.

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Send a delegation of police officers to assist in the investigation into the disappearance of Madeleine Mccann."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number-10.gov.uk/output/Page11851.asp

Prime Minister's Office
